com.masprop.cluster1.shared.controller
Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
  com.masprop.cluster1.shared.controller.ApplicationController

public abstract class ApplicationController
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the skeleton implementation for any Game Application Controller.

It provides a singleton handle reference to itself based on a GameType for any client application to get access to the different controllers for a Game

It is composed of a GUIManager and a GameManager and it has an application level scope. It serves as the necessary delegation layer between the GUIManager and GameManager

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Anshuman Mehta
See Also:
GUIManager, GameManager, Game, GameType

public static ApplicationController getUniqueInstance()
This instance should be used by client applications which are aware that that their ApplicationController has been instantiated. The null checks have to be handled by the client.
